headline: VARIAN ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 6.9 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump          Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Varian SD-200
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model SD-200
Pumping Speed 6.9 CFM (195.0 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-3(En) torr (4.00E-3 mbar)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Motor Horsepower .5 HP
Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Weight 53 lb (24 kg)
